com.deagenstroup.agendaassistant.ui

Class SelectionListAdapter<T extends SelectionListAdapter.SelectionHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<T>
      • com.deagenstroup.agendaassistant.ui.SelectionListAdapter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A Holder class within the subclass which derives from this classes Holder class.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategoryListAdapter, ScheduledListAdapter, TaskListAdapter

    public abstract class SelectionListAdapter<T extends SelectionListAdapter.SelectionHolder>
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<T>
    A class for deriving a RecyclerView Adapter which has holder selection and holder moving functionality.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  SelectionListAdapter.HolderListener 
      static class  SelectionListAdapter.SelectionHolder
      A class which represents a single item within the RecyclerView.

      • fragment

        protected android.support.v4.app.Fragment fragment

      • planner

        protected Planner planner

      • allowOperations

        protected boolean allowOperations
        If set to true, they then selection and holder moving operations are performed. If set to false, no selection or holder moving operations are performed.

      • selectedHolder

        protected SelectionListAdapter.SelectionHolder selectedHolder
        The SelectedHolder object which is currently selected by the user.
